They also often involve a hero or group of heroes on a quest to save their world from an evil force. Additionally, many of these books have elements of magic and supernatural powers.

The battle raged on, but eventually the enemy was forced to retreat. Arlen and his warriors had won the day, but at great cost. Many of their number lay wounded or dead on the field.

But even in the face of such tragedy, Arlen felt a sense of pride. He had fought for his people, for the wild hunt, and he would do it again in a heartbeat. He turned to his comrades, offering them a grim smile.

"Well fought, brothers," he said. "Now let us tend to our wounded and prepare for the next battle. The enemy will not rest, and neither can we."
